snippet: Changes announced by Attorney General Holder will advance equality and the justice system.
abstract: Editorial praises updated policies unveiled by the Justice Department as it seeks to eliminate distinction between same-sex and opposite-sex married couples in the federal justice system; criticizes Obama administration for hesitating to move forward with measure that would bar federal contractors from refusing to hire workers on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.
lead_paragraph: Changes announced by Attorney General Holder will advance equality and the justice system.
